PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The external quantum efficiency ( EQE ) spectra were also measured ( Figure 4b ).

Let's think step by step.

1. External quantum efficiency (EQE)

This is a property name that refers to the quantum efficiency of an external device, such as a solar cell, in converting photons into electrical current. The quantum efficiency is a measure of how effectively the device utilizes the incident photons to generate electrons. In this context, the "EQE spectra" likely refers to the measurement of the quantum efficiency as a function of wavelength or energy of the incident photons.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. External quantum efficiency (EQE)

This is a material property that refers to the quantum efficiency of an external device, such as a solar cell, in converting photons into electrical current. The quantum efficiency is a measure of how effectively the device utilizes the incident photons to generate electrons.
